data.quote: I'm totally into new age and self-help books. I used to work in a bookstore and that's the section they gave me, and I got way into it. I just loved the power of positive thinking, letting yourself go.

data.quote: We were really grown up for our age and it was an incredible special band.

data.quote: I knew from the age of 16 that I wanted to be a writer because I just didn't think I could do anything else. So I read and read and wrote short stories and dreamed of escape.

data.author: Dave Barry

data.quote: It's hard for women at my age in Hollywood, but I'm not discouraged.

data.quote: I think when the full horror of being fifty hits you, you should stay home and have a good cry.

data.quote: Oh rage! Oh despair! Oh age, my enemy!

data.quote: To be renewed is everything. What more could one ask for than to have one's youth back again?

data.quote: The perceptions of middle age have their own luminosity.

data.quote: A grownup is a child with layers on.

data.quote: I've watched my peers get better with age and hoped that would happen with me.

data.quote: My age and health will never allow me to realize the dream of art I've been pursuing all my life.

data.quote: Confidence is something you're born with. I know I had loads of it even at the age of 15.

data.quote: Of course, you see your body changing as you age, but it's more important to live than be too preoccupied with that sort of thing. I think ultimately what people care about in other people is the energy, the spirit.

data.quote: We, after a certain age, after college, are so consumed about what we want to achieve in life, and we fiercely are ambitious and we go after that, but sometimes we tend to take all our loved and dear ones for granted.

data.author: Erich Fromm

data.quote: Reason is a crutch for age, but youth is strong enough to walk alone.

data.quote: You hit a certain age and - especially because of TV - the young cooks coming up say, 'You're a sellout, because you're doing something other than what you should be doing.' data.quote: Sure I played, did you think I was born at the age of 70 sitting in a dugout trying to manage guys like you?

data.quote: I'm 42 and the age of a guy who has kids, so I guess I'm playing right where I'm supposed to be. I'm comfortable with that, but in the same breath I'd do something edgy. If someone came to me and offered me an edgy and funny story, then I'd do it.

data.quote: I was just a ham since about the age of five. If I was performing at Medieval Times or something, I'd be the court jester. That was always my defense mechanism. I was never all that funny; I was just obnoxious and loud.

data.quote: I get all fired up about aging in America.

data.quote: Old age isn't a battle old age is a massacre.

data.quote: A woman telling her true age is like a buyer confiding his final price to an Armenian rug dealer.

data.quote: I learned from a very young age that if I pursued the things that truly excited me, that they would reward in more important ways, like happiness.

data.quote: Middle age is youth without levity, and age without decay.

data.quote: I'm not afraid of aging.

data.quote: Forty is the old age of youth, fifty is the youth of old age.

data.quote: Did you come of age in those sweet summers of the early nineteen-sixties, when the airwaves were full of rock and roll's doo-wop promise of joy and the nation was full of J.F.K.'s eloquent promise of a New Frontier? data.quote: People sometimes announce that we have entered 'the information age' as if information did not exist in other times. I think that every age was an age of information, each in its own way and according to the available media.

data.quote: The real sadness of fifty is not that you change so much but that you change so little.

data.quote: It's easier to learn things for life by the age of 12 and not the age of 18. This is just my guess.

data.quote: A lot of the time with child actors, you get the feeling they're trying to have a kind of poise or presentation that's beyond their years that might be put on, but also might be because they've spent years just hanging out with adults and they don't even have a sense of what it's like to grow up with kids their own age.

data.quote: The first interview I went on I got at age 5. It was a commercial for First Federal Bank.

data.quote: Age is getting to know all the ways the world turns, so that if you cannot turn the world the way you want, you can at least get out of the way so you won't get run over.

data.quote: Age is how we determine how valuable you are.
data.author: Jane Elliot

data.quote: Once you find love, you find it. There isn't an age on love.
data.author: Candace Cameron Bure

data.quote: Knowing how to age and not being afraid of aging is very healthy.

data.quote: One industrial age belief is that GDP or GNP is a measure of progress. I don't care if you're the President of China or the U.S., if your country doesn't grow, you're in trouble. data.author: Peter Senge

data.quote: I had the fortune or misfortune to learn how to read fluently starting at the age of three. So I had read maybe 150 books by the time I hit 1st grade. And I already knew that the teachers were lying to me.

data.quote: It's a bit startling to achieve global recognition before the age of 30 on account of your sister, your brother-in-law and your bottom. One day I might be able to make sense of this. In the meantime I think it's fair to say that it has its upside and its downside.

data.quote: I was 3 and a half, and there was an open call for a Coca-Cola commercial. We were living around Dallas, and my mom took me. I think they were calling for 16-year-olds that could ride horses and swing a rope, and for whatever reason, my mom took me up there when I was 3. But I always had a rope, and I was a little cowboy at that age.

data.quote: Age is like love, it cannot be hid.
data.author: Thomas Dekker

data.quote: This age thinks better of a gilded fool Than of a threadbare saint in wisdom's school.
data.author: Thomas Dekker

data.quote: You can construct the character of a man and his age not only from what he does and says, but from what he fails to say and do.
data.author: Norman Douglas

data.quote: The lovely thing about being forty is that you can appreciate twenty-five-year-old men more.

data.quote: I'll tell you something: my dad was a nuclear engineer and he was really bright, and I've always said that because of negotiating at such a young age with my dad, it was really such a gift because I could then negotiate with very difficult personalities - and not end up being the scapegoat. I learned to really pick and choose my battles.

data.quote: Like I said on my bio on my webpage, I was born at an early age, I was close to my mother.
data.author: Peter Jurasik

data.quote: At 19, everything is possible and tomorrow looks friendly.
data.author: Jim Bishop

data.quote: In old age we are like a batch of letters that someone has sent. We are no longer in the past, we have arrived.
data.author: Knut Hamsun

data.quote: The reason for the sadness of this modern age and the men who live in it is that it looks for the truth in everything and finds it.
data.author: Edmond de Goncourt

data.quote: I should have been out there having a wild time like all the other girls my age, but I wasn't. I was going home every night to what was, initially, a very happy marriage.

data.quote: It was something of a personal challenge for me to come up with a business suitable for the Internet world and the Internet age.
data.author: David Tang

data.quote: Old age is an excellent time for outrage. My goal is to say or do at least one outrageous thing every week.
data.author: Louis Kronenberger

data.quote: Genius worship is the inevitable sign of an uncreative age.
data.author: Clive Bell

data.quote: Heaven be thanked, we live in such an age when no man dies for love except upon the stage.
data.author: John Osborne

data.quote: When a noble life has prepared old age, it is not decline that it reveals, but the first days of immortality.
data.author: Muriel Spark

data.quote: India saw from the beginning, and, even in her ages of reason and her age of increasing ignorance, she never lost hold of the insight, that life cannot be rightly seen in the sole light, cannot be perfectly lived in the sole power of its externalities.
data.author: Sri Aurobindo

data.quote: I live in Surrey, but up until the age of eight I lived in London. And the way I heard about this 'Peter Pan' film was there was an open-call audition that I'd heard about, or read about, and I just thought, 'Oh, I'll go along for the fun.' Because I never dreamed in a million years I'd ever get it.
data.author: Rachel Hurd-Wood

data.quote: I hid the fact that I had an aneurysm for a very long time. I was embarrassed, and I just felt like no one needed to know because it made me look weak. Who would of thought someone my age, at 23, had a brain aneurysm?
data.author: Tamala Jones

data.quote: I was trying to be 27 at age 47, but God had to get rid of my vanity. I had trouble letting go of the old Lex physically. data.quote: Civilization is so hard on the body that some have called it a disease, despite the arts that keep puny bodies alive to a greater average age, and our greater protection from contagious and germ diseases.

data.quote: No man is ever old enough to know better.
data.author: Holbrook Jackson

data.quote: My mother sent me to psychiatrists since the age of four because she didn't think little boys should be sad. When my brother was born, I stared out the window for days. Can you imagine that?
data.author: Andy Kaufman

data.quote: You don't stop laughing because you grow older. You grow older because you stop laughing.
data.author: Maurice Chevalier

data.quote: Old age isn't so bad when you consider the alternative.

data.quote: At age three, if you have a still-growing brain, it's a human behavior. In chimps, by age three, the brain is formed over 90 percent. data.quote: The moral and political principles that govern men are derived from three sources: revelation, natural law, and the artificial conventions of society. data.quote: Only one thing has to change for us to know happiness in our lives: where we focus our attention.

data.quote: Choose your life's mate carefully. From this one decision will come 90 percent of all your happiness or misery.

data.quote: If you can ensure happiness and public order, the country will go ahead well, just like what all Thais want.

data.quote: Desire nothing, give up all desires and be happy.

data.quote: The wretched and miserable would rise into plenty of joy and happiness as soon as they climb the steps of my mosque.
